description:
What is it: Creates a Windows Update configuration for Intune managed devices that gets updates after Insiders but before devices with default policy. 
 Simeon Notes: A Windows update ring is the best way to ensure Windows updates are compatible in your environment. The preview ring is meant to be applied to a subset of users that use a variety of programs. Simeon’s baseline delays feature and quality updates to the preview group for 7 days after released by Microsoft. Once the deferral period has expired for the device, users have 3 days to restart (if required). Also, unattended updates are only be applied outside the working hours of 5am to 10pm. Applies to users in the Azure AD group ‘BUILTIN - Corporate Devices – Preview’. 
 Learn More: https://techcommunity.microsoft.com/t5/windows-it-pro-blog/tactical-considerations-for-creating-windows-deployment-rings/ba-p/746979
